intro.question: Can you tell me a little about yourself and your background in software engineering?
Why are you interested in this role and our company?
What motivated you to pursue a career in software engineering?
What are your main strengths and weaknesses as a software engineer?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in software engineering?

main.question: Can you tell me about a time when you faced a significant challenge at work? How did you handle it?
Describe a situation where you had to work closely with a team. What was your role and how did you contribute?
Tell me about a time when you had to learn a new technology or tool quickly. How did you approach it?
Have you ever had a disagreement with a coworker? How did you resolve it?
Can you describe a project where you had to manage multiple tasks and deadlines? How did you prioritize?
Tell me about a time when you had to debug a difficult issue in your code. What was your process?
Describe a time when you went above and beyond your regular responsibilities to complete a project or task.
Have you ever had to handle a situation where a project was not going as planned? What did you do?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to mentor a junior colleague or intern? How did you ensure their success?
Tell me about a time when you had to adapt to significant changes in a project or work environment. How did you manage it?

closing.question: What are your career goals and how does this role fit into them?
What do you consider to be your most significant achievement in your career so far?
How do you handle feedback and criticism in your work?
What do you think sets you apart from other candidates for this position?
Do you have any questions for us about the role or company?

intro.question: Can you briefly describe your experience with case studies in software engineering?
What methodologies do you use when approaching a case study?
Can you give an example of a case study you have worked on?

How do you stay updated with best practices for case studies?

main.question: How would you approach a case study where you need to improve the performance of an existing application?

How would you handle a case study where you need to redesign an application for better user experience?

What is your process for validating the results of a case study?
How do you integrate feedback from team members or stakeholders into your case study analysis?
Can you give an example of a challenging case study you worked on and how you overcame the challenges?

closing.question: What have you learned from conducting case studies in your career?
How do you handle criticism or differing opinions on your case study findings?
What do you consider your most successful case study and why?
What are your career goals and how does this role fit into them?
